t: Revelation 2

Unto*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r of*r Ephesus*r write;*r These*r things*r saith*r he*r that*r holdeth*r the*r seven*r stars*r in*r his*r right*r hand,*r who*r walketh*r in*r the*r midst*r of*r the*r seven*r golden*r candlesticks;*r

And*rp hast*r borne,*r and*r hast*r patience,*r and*r for*r my*r name's*r sake*r hast*r laboured,*r and*r hast*r not*r fainted.*r
Nevertheless*rp I*r have*r somewhat*r against*r thee,*r because*r thou*r hast*r left*r thy*r first*r love.*r

I*rp know*r thy*r works,*r and*r tribulation,*r and*r poverty,*r (but*r thou*r art*r rich)*r and*r I*r know*r the*r blasphemy*r of*r them*r which*r say*r they*r are*r Jews,*r and*r are*r not,*r but*r are*r the*r synagogue*r of*r Satan.*r

But*rp I*r have*r a*r few*r things*r against*r thee,*r because*r thou*r hast*r there*r them*r that*r hold*r the*r doctrine*r of*r Balaam,*r who*r taught*r Balac*r to*r cast*r a*r stumblingblock*r before*r the*r children*r of*r Israel,*r to*r eat*r things*r sacrificed*r unto*r idols,*r and*r to*r commit*r fornication.*r
So*rp hast*r thou*r also*r them*r that*r hold*r the*r doctrine*r of*r the*r Nicolaitans,*r which*r thing*r I*r hate.*r

Notwithstanding*rp I*r have*r a*r few*r things*r against*r thee,*r because*r thou*r sufferest*r that*r woman*r Jezebel,*r which*r calleth*r herself*r a*r prophetess,*r to*r teach*r and*r to*r seduce*r my*r servants*r to*r commit*r fornication,*r and*r to*r eat*r things*r sacrificed*r unto*r idols.*r

And*rp I*r will*r kill*r her*r children*r with*r death;*r and*r all*r the*r churches*r shall*r know*r that*r I*r am*r he*r which*r searcheth*r the*r reins*r and*r hearts:*r and*r I*r will*r give*r unto*r every*r one*r of*r you*r according*r to*r your*r works.*r
